long_description: The Kinetic Pro flywheel is perfect for hardcore endurance workouts, like tempo and long, slow distance rides. Add it to your Kurt Kinetic bike trainer, sold separately. 60 sec. coast-down time from 25 mph and a slow acceleration provide an increased realism and roadlike feel. Pro Flywheel is precision machined and balanced. Attaches and removes easily for interval sessions. For use with Kinetic Road Machine and Kinetic Rock-N-Roll models manufactured after January 1, 2010 (serial # 76184 and higher).
short_description: The Kinetic Pro flywheel is perfect for hardcore endurance workouts, like tempo and long, slow distance rides. Add it to your Kurt Kinetic bike trainer, sold separately.
